code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./AdminVolunteer.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AdminVolunteer(){const[eventVolunteerData,setEventVolunteerData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/volunteers/events').then(response=>{if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}return response.json();}).then(data=>{console.log('Fetched event and volunteer data:',data);setEventVolunteerData(data);}).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching event and volunteer data:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:eventVolunteerData.map((eventData,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"table-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:eventData.eventName}),Array.isArray(eventData.volunteers)&&eventData.volunteers.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"volunteer-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"S.No"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Phone Number"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:eventData.volunteers.map((volunteer,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:idx+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:volunteer.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:volunteer.collegeId}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:volunteer.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:volunteer.phoneNumber})]},idx))})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No volunteers registered."})]},index))});}export default AdminVolunteer;
